alert.note: Alert for Gregory (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 18 at 8:53PM MDT until July 18 at 9:30PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN CHARLES MIX AND GREGORY COUNTIES... At 951 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles west of Geddes, or 18 miles west of Lake Andes, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Mesonet site reported a 57 mph wind gust 14 miles west of Platte, SD around 928 PM CDT. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lake Andes, Pickstown, Gregory, Platte, Burke, Bonesteel, Geddes, Dallas, Herrick, St. Charles, Fairfax, Dixon In Gregory County and southwestern Yankton Sioux Tribal Nation. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
